snippet: Sun Pharmaceutical Industries, the Indian drug maker, said on Sunday that it would pay about $4 billion in stock for Ranbaxy Laboratories, a smaller Indian rival.
abstract: Sun Pharmaceutical Industries, the Indian drug maker, said on Sunday that it would pay about $4 billion in stock for Ranbaxy Laboratories, a smaller Indian rival.

headline.main: Sun Pharmaceuticals of India to Buy Ranbaxy, a Smaller Rival
